GetX.Description: Returns the X value of the location

GetY.Description: Returns the Y value of the location

GetZ.Description: Returns the Z value of the location

DistanceTo.Description: Returns the distance to another location

DistanceToSquared.Description: Returns the squared distance to another location

SetBlockAtLocation.Description: Sets the block at the specific location

DropItem.Description: spawns an item entity of the itemstack at the specific location
